description: Montaz Morgan turns his gaze to Tag Adams. OK, we all know thatTag has been in lots of fuck flicks over the past year or two -- but thistime he does something totally different. In this scene, Montaz takesred hot candles and tortures poor, screaming, Tag until his entire furrytorso is covered in steaming hot wax. This is real torture, and the lookin Montaz's eyes told us that we had better keep an eye on this guylest he take the scene too far! Snuff out the candles, but don't kill ourS/M bottoms!!!
title: The Shaft
